name: The Lone Tower
description:
A short platforming game set in a vast desert. The goal is to reach the top of a tower that mysteriously happens to be in the middle of nowhere.

Controls:

WSAD - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Slow walk

Esc - Pause

F1 - Restart

Music and help done by :

Speaking Through Electricity https://speakingthroughelectricity.bandcamp.com/

Kasia Zima https://www.instagram.com/kasiasdrawer_drawings/?igshid=ZDdkNTZiNTM%3D

Hope you enjoy :)
